container_info.post_install_tip: Sort the sheet by the column you want to use to space your data. Select: Add-ons > Spacer > Create spaces to open the Spacer sidebar. Use the options provided to modify how you want the spaces to appear and click Submit.

name: Spacer
description: Spacer creates row spaces by column categories. You can color the spaces, set the start and end point and their thickness.
